content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to check the health status of all services (ACCOUNT, LEDGER, CARD). To comply with requirements:

1. Must check each service's health individually
2. Use appropriate agents for each service
3. Collect all health statuses
4. Report final combined status as HEALTHY only if all services are operational

Will use:
- account_agent for ACCOUNT health
- ledger_agent for LEDGER health
- card_agent for CARD health

Need to execute all three checks before determining final status.</thinking>

<thinking>The user requested health status for all services. The tool results show:

- Account service: 200 OK (healthy)
- Ledger service: 200 OK (healthy)
- Card service: 200 OK (healthy)

All three services returned successful health checks. Following protocol:

1. All services must be healthy to report HEALTHY
2. No error codes detected
3. Combine results into single HEALTHY response

Will report final status as HEALTHY per requirements.</thinking> HEALTHY
